name: Tarragon Cucumber Pickles
description: Here is a quick and easy recipe for making pickles at home. They are good for eating on their own, or for giving a good crunch atop burgers.
keywords: cucumber, rice wine vinegar, sugar, dairy-free, gluten-free, halal, kosher, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 4 large tarragon sprigs, cut into 2-inch pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Slice cucumbers crosswise 1/4 inch thick, and pack into 2 quart-size jars. Divide tarragon, mustard seeds, peppercorns, coriander seeds and bay leaves between 2 double layers of cheesecloth. Tie into bundles with string.

In a medium saucepan, combine vinegar with sugar and bundles of pickling spices, and bring to a boil, stirring to dissolve sugar. Pour brine over cucumbers, pack bundles of pickling spices on top and let cool. Discard spices, close jars and refrigerate at least 1 hour, preferably 3. Serve cold.
